turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I like to order a drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I's like to get a Frappuccino a grande Frappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande frapuccino with whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please repeat the address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 10002 North Dale Mabry Highway, Tampa, Florida 33618.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 1002 north dale north dale mabry highway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
